item.description:
JOIN KADANSE FOR AN OPEN HOUSE NIGHT ON MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 10TH

6:45PM: FREE - Beginner Ballroom - Been looking for a reason to Dance like a Star?  Join us for an intro group class on the 10th

7:30pm: FREE - ZUMBA - Wonder why this fitness craze has not slowed down?  Check it out on the 10th

**We will have door prizes, including a free private lesson!  Lace up your shoes and join us on the floor....

 

Kadanse is a fun and casual dance studio located on the North Shore.

Please join us for our Beginner Group classes on Monday nights!

Single students and couples are welcome.

In this class, we will alternate between popular Ballroom and Latin dances, from Swing and ChaCha to Foxtrot and Tango.

When:Mondays @ 6:45pm

Level: Newcomer (no prior experience required)

Cost: $10 per person/per class

Contact us for additional information:

www.kadanse.com

781-27-DANCE (273-2623)

info@kadanse.com

group.name: The North Shore Ballroom Dancing Meetup Group

item.name: OPEN HOUSE - Beginner Ballroom, Free Group Class
